CatDescriptText: Mrs. H. Manns, 2930 Crockett Street, was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 19, 1958, pg. 9 with question: "Do you think that a business recession has hit the United States? If so, how has it affected you?" answer reads: "Oh  yes, there definitely is a recession.  And it has not only affected my family but also my neighbors.  The reasons seem to be a loss of work and the fact that the cost of living is too high."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Mrs. H. Manns wearing short sleeved gingham suit, holding paper bag and umbrella, standing on sidewalk in front of G.C. Murphy, Market Square, Downtown
